mapper.insert: insert into user(u_account, u_password, u_name, u_tele, u_facultyID, u_identity) values (#{u_account}, #{u_password}, #{u_name}, #{u_tele}, #{u_facultyID}, #{u_identity})
mapper.update: update user set u_account=#{u_account}, u_password=#{u_password}, u_name=#{u_name}, u_tele=#{u_tele}, u_facultyID=#{u_facultyID}, u_identity=#{u_identity} where u_ID = #{u_ID}
